body_html:
Tensorflow from pip repo supports cuda 9.0 and you installed cuda 9.2 in your machine. Which is causing this issue.

Solution:

  1. Install cuda 9.0 in your machine
  2. Install tensorflow from sources with cuda 9.2
body_text:
Tensorflow from pip repo supports cuda 9.0 and you installed cuda 9.2 in your machine. Which is causing this issue.
Solution:

Install cuda 9.0 in your machine
Install tensorflow from sources with cuda 9.2
body:
Tensorflow from pip repo supports cuda 9.0 and you installed cuda 9.2 in your machine. Which is causing this issue. 

Solution:
1. Install cuda 9.0 in your machine
2. Install tensorflow from sources with cuda 9.2
